name: Warspear Online
description: Create a character and fight your enemies in 2D MMORPG with your friends. Huge open world, guild castles, free PvP, arena, battles between Alliances, Guilds, Dungeons and jolly holidays await!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.3-compatible; 128 Mb video memory Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update your graphics drivers for OpenGL 1.3 support.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0-compatible; 256 Mb video memory Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update your graphics drivers for OpenGL 3.0 support.
